text.language: Ebolqen I/cou n~te Cira, pip~rov/t/c: e~repefc~mou eyouab swpi neman a~m/n efjw m~moc:
A reading from the Wisdom of Joshua, son of Sirach, the prophet. May his holy blessings be with us. Amen.
Pembacaan dari Kitab-kitab Hikmat Yesus Bin Sirakh, kiranya berkat berkat-nya beserta kita. Amin.
من يشوع بن سيراخ النبي بركته المقدسة تکون معنا. آمين.
